attributes.action: educate children presently at school to learn the content, history and respect of the British National Anthem
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned would like the Prime Minister to consider making all schools learn not only the content and history, but respect of the National Anthem of the United Kingdom.

No longer will the children, nor adults of this land, mumble the words of our own National Anthem when it is played.
